name: "The Cardinal's Revenge"-Episode 5 of "SAJV" Quiz | Television | 10 Questions

questions.text: What is unique about the kind of time travel Jules and co. have experienced?
questions.correct: It's not just time travel--it's parallel existence.
options: You can only go backward in time.
You can go anywhere in time you want. . .but you can't get back.
You can only go forward in time.
questions.explanation:
It's not just time travel--it's parallel existence.

	King Louis looks exactly like Jules, Madame D'Ufe looks exactly like Rebecca, Cardinal Richelieu looks exactly like Phileas, and Porthos looks exactly like Alexandre Dumas.

All these things.

	Cardinal Richelieu enlists Madame D'Ufe to help him assassinate King Louis. Her job is to slip the poison into the king's mouth when they're, uh, you know. And Rebecca, who is Madame D'Ufe's look-alike, is caught in the middle, and expected to carry out this evil plan.

questions.text: Who do Phileas and Jules enlist to help them find Rebecca?
options: No one; they think they can do it by themselves.
questions.explanation:
The Three Musketeers.

	By chance, they happen upon d'Artagnan, the fourth musketeer. He helps them find Aramis and Porthos (Athos died of a broken heart, so d'Artagnan says), and they storm the castle, rescue the damsel in distress, and generally save the day.

questions.text: What colour is the dress Rebecca wears to see the king?
questions.explanation:
Red.

	They also crimp her hair, making her look very lovely indeed.

questions.text: Who says this: "Ah, we seem to be at a crossroads. We have squalor on the left, and filth on the right. Would you be so kind as to pick the lesser of two evils?"
questions.explanation:
Phileas Fogg.

	Generally agreed on by most "SAJV" fans as the funniest Phileas quote!

questions.text: Meanwhile, while all of this is happening, where is Passepartout?
questions.correct: Stuck between time dimensions. . .or something similar
options: At a luau with Patrick Duffy
questions.explanation:
Stuck between time dimensions. . .or something similar

	Passepartout tampered with the time machine--again--and got stuck in it, zooming back and forth between dimensions.

questions.text: How does Cardinal Richelieu find out that Rebecca is not the real Madame D'Ufe?
questions.correct: The real Madame D'Ufe tells him.
options: She's too short to be Madame D'Ufe.
She doesn't kiss the same way as Madame D'Ufe.
She has a strange accent that Madame D'Ufe doesn't have.
questions.explanation:
The real Madame D'Ufe tells him.

	The real Madame D'Ufe comes in, with the poison she intends to use to kill King Louis. When the cardinal realizes that he has just revealed the whole scheme to a total stranger (Rebecca), he blames Madame D'Ufe and stabs her.

questions.text: Why does Phileas know that Rebecca isn't dead?
options: He would have heard her scream.
He doesn't think she'd be stupid enough to get herself killed.
questions.explanation:
He would feel it.

	Phileas: "Rebecca is not dead, Verne. I would know. I would feel it."

questions.text: When Passepartout finally figures out how to get back to the 1600's to pick up the rest of the gang, what happens?
questions.correct: Everyone except for Rebecca, Phileas, and Jules stops moving.
options: Everyone except for Rebecca, Phileas, and Jules drops dead.
questions.explanation:
Everyone except for Rebecca, Phileas, and Jules stops moving.

	Everyone from the 1600's freezes except for the gang, which is disppointing for them, since they don't get a chance to thank the three musketeers for their help.

questions.text: Before Rebecca hops onto the time machine, what does she do?
options: Kicks the cardinal in the rear end
questions.explanation:
Kisses King Louis.

	Aww. . . she may have punched him in his bedroom, but I guess she really did like him. Thanks for playing my quiz, and please rate it!
